name: ia-chrome-extension-linux
description: A Chrome Extension to use NHS Digital's Identity Agent from Linux

scripts.build: parcel build --no-cache --no-minify injected.js && parcel build --no-cache --no-minify content.js && parcel build --no-cache --no-minify background.js && parcel build --public-url . --no-cache --no-minify popup.pug  && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
